A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A disgrace to fans of George Lucas' films. JJ Abrams beautifully set up what could have been a great story\, but what we get here is a movie that seems to ignore or destroy every interesting plot point from Force Awakens. Princess Leia flying through space was the stupidest thing ever put into a movie. There are scenes that defy basic physics and rules already laid out in the star wars universe like inventing new force powers and making a new version of Luke Skywalker that's nothing like the Luke we all know. I can't imagine anyone is happy with the way they handled the end of the skywalker family. Just terrible\, they should scrap and remake with someone who actually cares about star wars.
